title: Players needed for a team (Provisionals already completed)
body:
I'm looking for four full time players to join my team, Reapers of Rift (RoR). I main jungle, but I can play all roles, so changing up isn't an issue. My team has already completed provisionals and ready to climb in 5v5's. Hopefully looking for some great optimistic and communicative players, to have a fun time and improve, but maybe even become serious players.

If anyones interested chuck us a message in game, Zaim

Cheers

replies.body:
Name: deathangel1 
im very interested in ranks 5 teams i play every day alot of experience i main sup but i can do every other role successfully im Bronze , i cant say which 1 cuz it changes everyday and im mature got all communication apps ect
